meanings.definition: Of or relating to the rump or buttocks.
meanings.sent1: The pygal cushion provided extra comfort for the chair.
meanings.sent2: She wore pygal pants that accentuated her curves.
meanings.sent3: The pygal pillow was so fluffy, it felt like sitting on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The pygal shape of the chair resembled a gentle slope.
meanings.sent5: The pygal contour of the landscape was soothing to the eyes.

meanings.definition: A person with a large or prominent buttocks.
meanings.sent1: The pygal in the room caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the pygal of the group due to his physique.
meanings.sent3: The pygal at the party was the center of attraction.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves highlighted her pygal in a graceful manner.
meanings.sent5: The pygal in the mirror made her smile with confidence.
